channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
I'm using Delta.
1. How can I make it so more than 1 player can attack 1 monster ? 2. How can I make it so when I mine, it doesn't stop after I mined only 1 ore ?
Thanks.

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Check your mining method?

You could add a loop to it, so it keeps mining.[/quote]

I’ve looked. Only the Essence keeps mining but not the other ores and the method is the same for all the rocks so I don’t know. -.-

Read full topic

<=4872)|| (absX >= 2368 && absX <= 2411 && absY >= 3088 && absY <= 3135) || (absX >= 3107 && absX <=
